sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>cert_template</collection> <condition>current.isValidRecord() || (current.operation() === 'insert')</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Update Template version</name> <order>200</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[var fieldChange = (current.name.changes() || current.filter.changes());
var desiredStateUtil = new DesiredStateUtil; var currentId = String(current.sys_id); var clonedCondition = desiredStateUtil.clonedConditions(currentId); for (var i = 0; i < clonedCondition.length; i++) fieldChange = fieldChange || clonedCondition[i].hasNext();
if (fieldChange) { var newRecordId = SNC.VersionControl.createNewVersion(current, false); // do not move references to latest version (new VersionControlUtil).redirect('cert_template', newRecordId); desiredStateUtil.copyConditions(currentId, newRecordId, clonedCondition); } else if(current.isValidRecord() && (current.operation() === 'insert')) SNC.VersionControl.createNewVersion(current, false); // used by Clone UI action]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2013-04-03 07:19:13</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>32983bb097a001009468770ddd2975b6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>53</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update Template version</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Certification Core" source="com.snc.certification_core">df36b0a03cb1311068bcf327dfe37f99</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_32983bb097a001009468770ddd2975b6</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2013-06-20 20:51:39</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=32983bb097a001009468770ddd2975b6"/> </record_update>
